pages.text: These sprawling, deadly deserts are quite the contrast to the temperate climates of other planets. they boast a poisonous atmosphere that slowly but surely penetrates even the most well protected suits if given enough time.

The singular benefit to these blazing balls of rock and rust is that everything on it can be used for some purpose. The sand can be processed into iron dust and maybe some oxygen, the rock can be melted down into lava with ease, and the crystals deep below can be used directly, or indirectly, to fuel further attempts to expand your technical knowledge.
